mil.nga.giat.geowave.accumulo.mapreduce

Class GeoWaveConfiguratorBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.nga.giat.geowave.accumulo.mapreduce.GeoWaveConfiguratorBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GeoWaveInputConfigurator, GeoWaveOutputConfigurator

    public class GeoWaveConfiguratorBase
extends Object
    This class forms the basis for GeoWave input and output format configuration.

      • enumToConfKey

        protected static String enumToConfKey(Class<?> implementingClass,
                                      Enum<?> e,
                                      String suffix)
        Provides a configuration key for a given feature enum, prefixed by the implementingClass, and suffixed by a custom String
        Parameters:
        implementingClass - the class whose name will be used as a prefix for the property configuration key
        e - the enum used to provide the unique part of the configuration key
        suffix - the custom suffix to be used in the configuration key
        Returns:
        the configuration key
